questions.question: Which C++ code correctly implements a function to find the factorial of a number?

What does this JavaScript code output?

console.log(typeof NaN);
Which C++ code correctly swaps two variables without a temporary variable?

What does this JavaScript code output?

console.log(0.1 + 0.2 === 0.3);
Which C++ code correctly checks if a number is prime?
Which C++ code correctly reverses a string in-place?

What does this JavaScript code output?

console.log([] + []);

What is the output of this JavaScript code?

console.log(1 + "2" + "2");
Which C++ code correctly implements binary search?

What does this JavaScript code output?

console.log(typeof typeof 1);
Which C++ code correctly finds the GCD of two numbers?

What is the output of this JavaScript code?

console.log([] == ![]);
Which C++ code correctly checks if a string is a palindrome?

What does this JavaScript code output?

console.log(!!"false" == !!!"true");

What is the output of this JavaScript code?

console.log(3 > 2 > 1);
Which C++ code correctly implements bubble sort?

What does this JavaScript code output?

console.log(Math.max() > Math.min());
Which C++ code correctly implements a stack using arrays?
